summary:
Espresso helps rollups - Espresso is designed to offer rollups a means of achieving credible neutrality, enhanced interoperability, & long-term alignment with Ethereum.

 Partnering with 10 node operators to decentralize Espresso’s Cappuccino testnet - Espresso will be decentralizing the set of nodes running HotShot consensus in its upcoming testnet, Cappuccino, to be released later this month.
